charges.charge_disposition: Dft comm cust BOP for 6 mos. Upon rel, dft plcd on supv rel for 3 yrs. Comply w/rules and regs of P/O and G.O. 318. Participate in outpatient substance abuse treatment. All fines are wv. Pay S/A of $50. Dft ord to surr to BOP on or bef 2/11/94 at 12:00 noon. Bnd exon upon surr. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:659, 2(a); THEFT OF INTERSTATE SHIPMENT; AIDING AND ABETTING (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft comm cust BOP 27 mos on ea ct conc. Upon rel, dft plcd on supv rel for 3 yrs conc. Comply w/rules and regs of P/O and G.O. 318. Participate in outpatient substance abuse treatment. Abstain from using illicit drugs/alcohol. Pay S/A of $100. Fines are wv. Dft to surr to BOP on or bef 2/11/94 at 12:00 noon. Bnd exon upon surr. (1)

Cust BOP for 27 mos. Supv rel for 3 yrs, comply w/rules and regs of P/O and G.O. 318, participate in outpatient substance abuse treatment. Dft shl pay costs of treating dft's drug/alsohol dependency. Fines wv. Pay S/A $50. In the interes of justice, Govt mots crt to dism ct 1. So ord. (2)
In the interest of justice, Govt mots the Crt to dism ct 1. It is so ord. (1)

Impos of sent is suspended and dft plcd on prob for 3 yrs. Comply w/rules and regs of P/O and G.O. 318. Reside for 4 mos in a CCC. Pay fine of $2000. Pay S/A of $50. In interest of justice, govt mvs to dism the remaining cnt. It is so ord. Bnd ord exon upon surr to CCC. (1)
